verses.text: \w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “Speak \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* tell \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

\w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* immediate family—\w his|strong="H3588"\w* mother, \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* brother,

\w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* unmarried sister \w who|strong="H7138"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w*, since \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* husband.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H2490"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* those related \w to|strong="H2490"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w marriage|strong="H1167"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w*.

\w Priests|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w bald|strong="H7139"\w* spots \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* \w off|strong="H1548"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w edges|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w beards|strong="H2206"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w cuts|strong="H8296"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w bodies|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* priest \w must|strong="H3947"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H1644"\w* defiled \w by|strong="H3808"\w* prostitution \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* husband, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* priest \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w regard|strong="H6942"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w presents|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*—\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w set|strong="H6942"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w apart|strong="H6942"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* defiles \w herself|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* prostituting \w herself|strong="H1931"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w profanes|strong="H2490"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* father; \w she|strong="H1931"\w* must \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w highest|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w ordained|strong="H4390"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priestly|strong="H3548"\w* garments, \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w* hang \w loose|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w tear|strong="H6533"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* garments.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*; \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w or|strong="H3808"\w* mother.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w desecrate|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w consecration|strong="H5145"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w The|strong="H3947"\w* woman \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w marries|strong="H3947"\w* \w must|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w* \w woman|strong="H1644"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* defiled \w by|strong="H3808"\w* prostitution. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w marry|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

\w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w sanctifies|strong="H6942"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*.”
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, ‘\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* physical \w defect|strong="H3971"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w defect|strong="H3971"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w*—\w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w disfigured|strong="H2763"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w deformed|strong="H8311"\w*;
\w no|strong="H1961"\w* man who \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w broken|strong="H7667"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*,

or who \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hunchback|strong="H1384"\w* or \w dwarf|strong="H1851"\w*, or who \w has|strong="H5869"\w* an \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w defect|strong="H8400"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* festering rash, \w scabs|strong="H3217"\w*, or \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w crushed|strong="H4790"\w* testicle.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w descendant|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w defect|strong="H3971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Since \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w defect|strong="H3971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* God as well as \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w defect|strong="H3971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w desecrate|strong="H2490"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctifies|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H6942"\w*.’”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.
